    Overview

    rsm-package
    Response-surface analysis

    Coding of data

    coded.data() as.coded.data() decode.data() recode.data() val2code() code2val() print(<coded.data>) is.coded.data() `[`(<coded.data>) codings() `codings<-`() `names<-`(<coded.data>) truenames() `truenames<-`()
    Functions for coded data

    Analysis

    rsm() summary(<rsm>) print(<summary.rsm>) codings(<rsm>) loftest() canonical() xs()
    Response-surface regression
    FO() TWI() PQ() SO() PE()
    Response-surface model components
    steepest() canonical.path()
    Steepest-ascent methods for response surfaces
    model.data()
    Reconstruct data from a linear model

    Experimental designs

    bbd()
    Generate a Box-Behnken design
    cube() star() dupe() foldover() ccd()
    Generate central-composite designs and associated building blocks
    ccd.pick()
    Find a good central-composite design
    djoin() stdorder()
    Join designs together into a blocked design
    varfcn()
    Display the scaled variance function for a design

    Graphics

    contour(<lm>) image(<lm>) persp(<lm>)
    Surface plot(s) of a fitted linear model
